entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 near noon. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Rain beginning after midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the evening. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022
